overview: He’s the handsome, dark-haired stud with the sexual appetite of a tiger in heat, who can be guaranteed to light up any scene just by being in it. What’s more, he’s man enough to appreciate a bit of cock for himself, and when he’s in the right mood will pretty much do anything to get his own hungry little arse stretched in return. Little wonder that the likes of Mike James, Florian Mraz and Johny Cruz just can’t wait to take on the fellow; knowing that a session with this ripped Czech beauty is a sure-fire spunk-fest each and every fucking time!
title: Let's Play with Shane Hirch
